content:
I'm passionate about helping organizations like yours harness the transformative potential of AIâ€”without the usual drawbacks. Whether you're a school administrator looking to streamline parent communications, a nonprofit stretching limited resources, or a business seeking competitive advantage, I'll help you integrate AI that delivers real results while respecting your privacy needs.


My approach focuses on open-source and self-hosted solutions that give you control over your technology and data. No more endless subscription fees or worrying about sensitive information being processed elsewhere. Through accessible low-code and no-code tools, I'll build systems that can grow with you as your AI journey evolves.
